column5: Any reports of how the fishing was in spring and fall. I am looking to book a trip in late aug on either quantz or napken. Any info would be great. Thanks

I'm told Napken is their second best pike lake, but have no idea about the walleye fishing there. I imagine it's standard for Hearst... great. It's their most remote lake option and it is a good sized lake.

Nice lake big water. Walleye in front of Camp during evening fishing.Biggest pike ~ 40 1/2 incher caught off dock & put back. Pike were small under 24" as an average. I like a lake that they are mid twenties to mid thirty average size. Not to say there not in there though. Good Luck
Fished Quantz this past August and had a good trip. Really like Hearst Air. I sent you a private message with more details back in November. Not sure if you saw this.
Are you affiliated with Hearst Air?
No affiliation. I'm from Michigan. My brother/buddies and I have fished with them four times.
